<h3 id="X30308">X(30308) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd ANTI-EULER AND SUBMEDIAL</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3+2*(b+c)*a^2+5*(b-c)^2*a-8*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(30308) = X(1)+4*X(381) = X(1)-16*X(9955) = 7*X(1)+8*X(18480) = X(1)+2*X(18492) = X(1)-4*X(18493) = 11*X(1)+4*X(18525) = 19*X(1)-4*X(18526) = 8*X(2)-3*X(165) = 2*X(2)+3*X(1699) = X(2)-6*X(3817) = 4*X(2)-9*X(7988) = 13*X(2)-3*X(9778) = X(2)+9*X(9779) = 7*X(2)+3*X(9812) = 11*X(2)-6*X(10164) = 7*X(2)-12*X(10171) = X(165)+4*X(1699) = X(165)-16*X(3817) = X(165)-6*X(7988) = 13*X(165)-8*X(9778) = 7*X(165)+8*X(9812) = 11*X(165)-16*X(10164) = X(381)+4*X(9955) = 7*X(381)-2*X(18480) = 11*X(381)-X(18525) = 19*X(381)+X(18526) = X(1699)+4*X(3817) = 2*X(1699)+3*X(7988) = 13*X(1699)+2*X(9778) = X(1699)-6*X(9779) = 7*X(1699)-2*X(9812) = 14*X(9955)+X(18480) = 8*X(9955)+X(18492) = 4*X(9955)-X(18493) = 4*X(18480)-7*X(18492) = 2*X(18480)+7*X(18493) = 22*X(18480)-7*X(18525) = X(18492)+2*X(18493)</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(11451). X(30308) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30308) lies on these lines:
{1,381}, {2,165}, {4,25055}, {5,3654}, {11,4654}, {12,30337}, {20,19883}, {30,7987}, {40,5055}, {376,3624}, {496,30343}, {517,19709}, {519,3091}, {528,15017}, {546,3655}, {547,12699}, {551,3839}, {946,3545}, {962,3828}, {1125,3543}, {1385,14269}, {1572,18362}, {1656,28198}, {1698,5071}, {1743,17737}, {2886,30393}, {3058,5219}, {3062,3255}, {3090,9589}, {3241,19925}, {3339,7741}, {3361,3582}, {3534,11230}, {3544,11362}, {3576,3830}, {3579,15703}, {3653,15687}, {3656,4677}, {3829,8226}, {3843,28208}, {3845,5886}, {3850,5881}, {3851,7982}, {3855,13464}, {3929,5536}, {4301,5068}, {4312,10589}, {4857,6849}, {4995,9580}, {5054,16192}, {5056,9588}, {5087,8580}, {5223,11680}, {5231,17781}, {5298,9579}, {5493,7486}, {5531,10707}, {5550,15683}, {5690,14892}, {5726,30384}, {5901,23046}, {6175,8583}, {6361,19872}, {7280,28444}, {7678,30330}, {7951,9819}, {7993,10711}, {8085,30371}, {8086,30395}, {8229,30363}, {8379,30394}, {8727,11407}, {9166,9860}, {9592,11648}, {9612,10072}, {9614,10056}, {9814,30311}, {9875,14639}, {10109,26446}, {10129,10582}, {10165,11001}, {10863,30291}, {10883,30304}, {11019,30340}, {11235,17618}, {11737,22791}, {12512,15708}, {13174,23234}, {13462,23708}, {13624,15684}, {14893,18481}, {15685,17502}, {15692,19862}, {15693,28146}, {15694,28202}, {15695,28154}, {15697,28158}, {15711,28182}, {15713,28178}, {15721,19878}, {18393,18421}, {19708,28150}, {28452,30282}, {30306,30396}, {30307,30397}, {30309,10655}, {30310,10656}</p>
<p>
X(30308) = midpoint of X(381) and X(18493)<br>
X(30308) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1698, 5071), (3679, 5818), (15692, 19862), (18492, 381)<br>
X(30308) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1699, 3817, 7988), (1699, 7988, 165), (18492, 18493, 1)<br>
</p>
<hr class="gray">
